title: Stream is LIVE! $50 RP giveaway at 250 followers! twitch.tv/michaelwp
body:
Hey everyone! Come help and support my stream out!

Look forward to hanging out and showing you my support skills! {{item:3160}}

replies.body: Bump! Come watch me power out some ARAMs! {{item:3078}}
Stream is LIVE! FRIDAY FIGHT NIGHT! {{summoner:14}}
Yes! I stream my ranked team practices, solo queue, and ARAMs!
Live in 15 minutes! Come hang out and don't forget to follow! {{summoner:6}}

Stream starting in 15 minutes! Come check out my team "Team Affinity eSports" practice in ranked! You can also hear our live voice communication which is pretty sweet!

twitch.tv/michaelwp
twitch.tv/michaelwp
twitch.tv/michaelwp

{{item:2045}}
Come hang out and follow! You're automatically entered for a chance to win all of my future giveaways! {{champion:201}}
